param.name: partition_or_controller
param.label: Partition or controller node?
param.help: Choose to run the service in the controller / login or partition / compute nodes

param.name: account
param.label: Slurm account:
param.help: Account to submit the interactive job to.

param.name: partition
param.label: Slurm partition:
param.help: Partition to submit the interactive job to.

param.name: numnodes
param.label: Number of nodes:
param.help: Number of nodes to request for the interactive session.

param.name: exclusive
param.label: Exclusive
param.help: The job allocation can not share nodes with other running jobs

param.name: walltime
param.help: e.g. 00:10:00 - Amount of time slurm will honor the interactive session.

param.name: stream
param.label: Stream slurm output?
param.help: Select Yes to stream the slurm output from the execution host to the job directory in PW

param.name: controller
param.label: Controller host
param.help: Use hostname@ip or a proxy like PoolName.clusters.pw. Use pw.conf to get PoolName from pw.conf

param.name: chdir
param.label: Working directory of the batch script
param.help: Working directory of the batch script to directory before it is executed

param.name: servicePort
param.label: Interactive remote service port
param.help: Port of the listening service on the remote compute node
